title: Devils in the Dark
description:
I have a recommendation for you....

From Audioboom Studios, Helen Anderson and her best friend Danni Howard turn back the clock to explore some of the wildest true crime cases in history. 

With the help of expert criminologists, pathologists and journalists who were on the scene, they’ll learn about the killer's origins, their crimes, and the motives behind their terrible acts.

The podcast launched on the 28th of February, with two episodes, the first one is Ed Gein.

Episodes will be weekly every Monday, so just search for Devils in The Dark and follow so you never miss an episode.
itunes:author: UK True Crime Podcast
dc:creator: UK True Crime Podcast
